Baby born in Costco Westgate Auckland bathroom growing fast - mum Gill Bay https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/baby-born-in-costco-westgate-auckland-bathroom-forming-fast-mum-gill-bay/2A7R2PHCOFCZNPSTR3COACUIRA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/baby-born-in-costco-westgate-auckland-bathroom-forming-fast-mum-gill-bay/2A7R2PHCOFCZNPSTR3COACUIRA/ Cherie HowieBaby Nathanael’s goals are 'just to feed and grow', mum says. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 06:00:00 +0000 Nathanael Bay was born in Costco Westgate's disabled bathroom last month after his mum Gill Bay went into labour unexpectedly while shopping for a baby shower planned the next day. Now aged just over 3 weeks, he weighs more than 2kg - up from his 1.5kg birthweight - and his delighted parents hope to take him home to Papakura soon.
